description:
Well, what can I say, I got scooped. I'd swear that Gage was not working anywhere else, but it turns out he recently made an appearance as Roman. ~sigh~
So you guys get to be further confused by the name changes, but get to enjoy him here in HD and without DRM.
Meet Gage, another super hot dude with everything in just the right amount.
This mid-western boy is super sweet, and I love that he can't help but smile (he knows the women love his smile). You can see from his photos he is fun and full of energy. He's got a new girlfriend he adores, and you can tell he is also tender and attentive. A total dreamboat package!
And that dick! Geeeez! Almost nine inches of straight up grade A beef!
This kid loves to show off and take you for a ride.
title: Gage - Solo
